column1: Smoque BBQ////We had the chopped brisket sandwich and the pulled pork. Both were good
column2: and I would order the chopped brisket again
column3: but the pulled pork just didn't taste too great. Their amazing spicy bbq sauce made up for this
column4: however the meat doesn't stand out on it's own. Their sides are pretty delicious. I enjoyed their cole slaw
column5: which held back on the mayo in favor of vinegar
column6: a big plus in my book. Their mac and cheese was good
column7: however I wish I would've ordered their fries
column8: which on the plate next to me looked delicious!
